recipes.label: A Glamour Woven
recipes.startdescription: When a song is sung right, the world does not stay unchanged. The air has been infused with power, and it clings on me like a perfume.

recipes.label: A Special Song
recipes.startdescription: The second note follows the first, and soon they become more than a sequence of sounds.
